00024 /**
00025  * The Push Notification Message.
00026  * 
00027  * The class represents a message to be delivered to an end user device.
00028  * Notification Service.
00029  * 
00030  * @ingroup ApnsPHP_Message
00031  * @see http://tinyurl.com/ApplePushNotificationPayload
00032  */ 
00033 class ApnsPHP_Message
00034 {
00035     const PAYLOAD_MAXIMUM_SIZE = 256; /**< @type integer The maximum size allowed for a notification payload. */
00036     
00037     protected $_bAutoAdjustLongPayload = true; /**< @type boolean If the JSON payload is longer than maximum allowed size, shorts message text. */
00038     
00039     protected $_aDeviceTokens = array(); /**< @type array Recipients device tokens. */
00040 
00041     protected $_sText; /**< @type string Alert message to display to the user. */
00042     protected $_nBadge; /**< @type integer Number to badge the application icon with. */
00043     protected $_sSound; /**< @type string Sound to play. */
00044     
00045     protected $_sCustomPropertyName; /**< @type string Custom property name. */
00046     protected $_mCustomPropertyValue; /**< @type mixed Custom property value. */
00047     
00048     /**
00049      * Constructor.
00050      *
00051      * @param  $sDeviceToken @type string @optional Recipients device token.
00052      */
00053     public function __construct($sDeviceToken = null)
00054     {
00055         if (isset($sDeviceToken)) {
00056             $this->addRecipient($sDeviceToken);
00057         }
00058     }
00059     
00060     /**
00061      * Add a recipient device token.
00062      *
00063      * @param  $sDeviceToken @type string Recipients device token.
00064      * @throws ApnsPHP_Message_Exception if the device token
00065      *         is not well formed.
00066      */
00067     public function addRecipient($sDeviceToken)
00068     {
00069         if (!preg_match('~[a-f0-9]{64}~i', $sDeviceToken)) {
00070             throw new ApnsPHP_Message_Exception(
00071                 "Invalid device token '{$sDeviceToken}'"
00072             );
00073         }
00074         $this->_aDeviceTokens[] = $sDeviceToken;
00075     }
00076     
00077     /**
00078      * Get a recipient.
00079      *
00080      * @param  $nRecipient @type integer @optional Recipient number to return.
00081      * @throws ApnsPHP_Message_Exception if no recipient number
00082      *         exists.
00083      * @return @type string The recipient token at index $nRecipient.
00084      */
00085     public function getRecipient($nRecipient = 0)
00086     {
00087         if (!isset($this->_aDeviceTokens[$nRecipient])) {
00088             throw new ApnsPHP_Message_Exception(
00089                 "No recipient at index '{$nRecipient}'"
00090             );
00091         }
00092         return $this->_aDeviceTokens[$nRecipient];
00093     }
00094     
00095     /**
00096      * Get the number of recipients.
00097      *
00098      * @return @type integer Recipient's number.
00099      */
00100     public function getRecipientsNumber()
00101     {
00102         return count($this->_aDeviceTokens);
00103     }
00104     
00105     /**
00106      * Get all recipients.
00107      *
00108      * @return @type array Array of all recipients device token.
00109      */
00110     public function getRecipients()
00111     {
00112         return $this->_aDeviceTokens;
00113     }
00114     
00115     /**
00116      * Set the alert message to display to the user.
00117      *
00118      * @param  $sText @type string An alert message to display to the user.
00119      */
00120     public function setText($sText)
00121     {
00122         $this->_sText = $sText;
00123     }
00124 
00125     /**
00126      * Get the alert message to display to the user.
00127      *
00128      * @return @type string The alert message to display to the user.
00129      */
00130     public function getText()
00131     {
00132         return $this->_sText;
00133     }
00134 
00135     /**
00136      * Set the number to badge the application icon with.
00137      *
00138      * @param  $nBadge @type integer A number to badge the application icon with.
00139      * @throws ApnsPHP_Message_Exception if badge is not an
00140      *         integer.
00141      */
00142     public function setBadge($nBadge)
00143     {
00144         if (!is_int($nBadge)) {
00145             throw new ApnsPHP_Message_Exception(
00146                 "Invalid badge number '{$nBadge}'"
00147             );
00148         }
00149         $this->_nBadge = $nBadge;
00150     }
00151     
00152     /**
00153      * Get the number to badge the application icon with.
00154      *
00155      * @return @type integer The number to badge the application icon with.
00156      */
00157     public function getBadge()
00158     {
00159         return $this->_nBadge;
00160     }
00161 
00162     /**
00163      * Set the sound to play.
00164      *
00165      * @param  $sSound @type string @optional A sound to play ('default sound' is
00166      *         the default sound).
00167      */
00168     public function setSound($sSound = 'default')
00169     {
00170         $this->_sSound = $sSound;
00171     }
00172 
00173     /**
00174      * Get the sound to play.
00175      *
00176      * @return @type string The sound to play.
00177      */
00178     public function getSound()
00179     {
00180         return $this->_sSound;
00181     }
00182 
00183     /**
00184      * Set a custom property.
00185      *
00186      * @param  $sName @type string Custom property name.
00187      * @param  $mValue @type mixed Custom property value.
00188      * @throws ApnsPHP_Message_Exception if custom property name is not outside
00189      *         the Apple-reserved 'aps' namespace.
00190      */
00191     public function setCustomProperty($sName, $mValue)
00192     {
00193         if ($sName == 'aps') {
00194             throw new ApnsPHP_Message_Exception(
00195                 "Property name 'aps' can not be used for custom property."
00196             );
00197         }
00198         $this->_sCustomPropertyName = trim($sName);
00199         $this->_mCustomPropertyValue = $mValue;
00200     }
00201     
00202     /**
00203      * Get the custom property name.
00204      * 
00205      * @return @type string The custom property name.
00206      */
00207     public function getCustomPropertyName()
00208     {
00209         return $this->_sCustomPropertyName;
00210     }
00211 
00212     /**
00213      * Get the custom property value.
00214      * 
00215      * @return @type mixed The custom property value.
00216      */
00217     public function getCustomPropertyValue()
00218     {
00219         return $this->_mCustomPropertyValue;
00220     }
00221 
00222     /**
00223      * Set the auto-adjust long payload value.
00224      *
00225      * @param  $bAutoAdjust @type boolean If true a long payload is shorted cutting
00226      *         long text value.
00227      */
00228     public function setAutoAdjustLongPayload($bAutoAdjust)
00229     {
00230         $this->_bAutoAdjustLongPayload = (boolean)$bAutoAdjust;
00231     }
00232     
00233     /**
00234      * Get the auto-adjust long payload value.
00235      *
00236      * @return @type boolean The auto-adjust long payload value.
00237      */
00238     public function getAutoAdjustLongPayload()
00239     {
00240         return $this->_bAutoAdjustLongPayload;
00241     }
00242     
00243     /**
00244      * PHP Magic Method. When an object is "converted" to a string, JSON-encoded
00245      * payload is returned.
00246      *
00247      * @return @type string JSON-encoded payload.
00248      */
00249     public function __toString()
00250     {
00251         try {
00252             $sJSONPayload = $this->getPayload();
00253         } catch (ApnsPHP_Message_Exception $e) {
00254             $sJSONPayload = '';
00255         }
00256         return $sJSONPayload;
00257     }
00258     
00259     /**
00260      * Convert the message in a JSON-encoded payload.
00261      *
00262      * @throws ApnsPHP_Message_Exception if payload is longer than maximum allowed
00263      *         size and AutoAdjustLongPayload is disabled.
00264      * @return @type string JSON-encoded payload.
00265      */
00266     public function getPayload()
00267     {
00268         $aPayload['aps'] = array();
00269         
00270         if (isset($this->_sText)) {
00271             $aPayload['aps']['alert'] = (string)$this->_sText;
00272         }
00273         if (isset($this->_nBadge) && $this->_nBadge > 0) {
00274             $aPayload['aps']['badge'] = (int)$this->_nBadge;
00275         }
00276         if (isset($this->_sSound)) {
00277             $aPayload['aps']['sound'] = (string)$this->_sSound;
00278         }
00279 
00280         if (isset($this->_sCustomPropertyName, $this->_mCustomPropertyValue)) {
00281             $aPayload[$this->_sCustomPropertyName] = $this->_mCustomPropertyValue;
00282         }
00283 
00284         $sJSONPayload = json_encode($aPayload, JSON_FORCE_OBJECT);
00285         $nJSONPayloadLen = strlen($sJSONPayload);
00286         
00287         if ($nJSONPayloadLen > self::PAYLOAD_MAXIMUM_SIZE) {
00288             if ($this->_bAutoAdjustLongPayload) {
00289                 $nTextLen = strlen($this->_sText);
00290                 if ($nJSONPayloadLen - $nTextLen <= self::PAYLOAD_MAXIMUM_SIZE) {
00291                     $this->_sText = substr($this->_sText, 0, $nTextLen - ($nJSONPayloadLen - self::PAYLOAD_MAXIMUM_SIZE));
00292                     return $this->getPayload();
00293                 } else {
00294                     throw new ApnsPHP_Message_Exception(
00295                         "JSON Payload is too long: {$nJSONPayloadLen} bytes. Maximum size is " . 
00296                         self::PAYLOAD_MAXIMUM_SIZE . " bytes. The message text can not be auto-adjusted."
00297                     );
00298                 }
00299             } else {
00300                 throw new ApnsPHP_Message_Exception(
00301                     "JSON Payload is too long: {$nJSONPayloadLen} bytes. Maximum size is " . 
00302                     self::PAYLOAD_MAXIMUM_SIZE . " bytes"
00303                 );
00304             }
00305         }
00306         
00307         return $sJSONPayload;
00308     }
00309 }
